column4: please i want to install ubuntu from the live cd but it opens busybox initramfs screen and stops .what can i do please?
At start or install press F6 and remove Quiet and Splash from the command line. If it still fails repeat and add noapic acpi=off before the --

Did you do the self test for errors and were there any?  you may need to go to the alternate cd..
